effect.Name: Quad With Metalic Reflections (Background)
effect.description: This shader is a modification of the Quad shader created by Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole) however, this shader contains "pseudo reflections" which emit reflections on the metal surface.
effect.author: Foxioo and Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole)

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Quad With Metalic Reflections (Background) | 1.1 (20.07.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader is a modification of the Quad shader created by Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole) however, this shader contains "pseudo reflections" which emit reflections on the metal surface.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Position X
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the texture in the X axis.

parameter.name: Position Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the texture in the Y axis.

parameter.name: xA (-X -Y)
parameter.description: X of point A (Top left point)

parameter.name: yA (-X -Y)
parameter.description: Y of point A (Top left point)

parameter.name: xB (+X -Y)
parameter.description: X of point B (Top right point)

parameter.name: yB (+X -Y)
parameter.description: Y of point B (Top right point)

parameter.name: xC (+X +Y)
parameter.description: X of point C (Bottom right point)

parameter.name: yC (+X +Y)
parameter.description: Y of point C (Bottom right point)

parameter.name: xD (-X +Y)
parameter.description: X of point D (Bottom left point)

parameter.name: yD (-X +Y)
parameter.description: Y of point D (Bottom left point)

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
